A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm an avid Star Wars fan\, I've been obsessed with everything Star Wars since I was 8 years old. This movie completely shat on everything these films stood for and logic. I've never reviewed a film on Rotten Tomatoes or any other social media before but this film left me so angry and heart broken I actually couldn't bring myself not to reflect on how poorly this trilogy has been handled. JJ set up the potential to hit a home run with the retrospective Force awakens but Rian has ignored fans and made a film that killed off the magic that was Star Wars. I award you zero points and may god have mercy on your soul. CAVEAT: I love all your other films Rian\, what happened Mate?
